mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER ( USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, CAREER_TYPE, EDU_CODE, MIN_SALARY, JOB_CODES, WORK_REGION_CODES ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{email}, #{name, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{careerType}, #{eduCode}, #{minSalary}, #{jobCodes}, #{workRegionCodes} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, EMAIL, NAME, CAREER_TYPE, EDU_CODE, MIN_SALARY, JOB_CODES, WORK_REGION_CODES -- , CREATED_AT FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username}
